page.title: 07HOME LIFE
page.content: I woke up at around 6:15 feeling drowsy.I turned on TV-AM.At 7:23 I had a cup of tea and then I got washed and changed and went downstairs for breakfast.After that I fed the guinea -pigs.Mum went off to work,dad had already gone,I went to school at 8:30. At school when assembly had finished we came back to class and did some comprehension work.At 10:40 we went out for break.When we came in we did some arithmetic.At 12:58 I went with the dinner monitors because I play my cornet and I need an early dinner. After dinner I wait till 12:30 then go for my cornet lesson.At 1:00 we did more work until 2:15.After break we had rounders until 3:30.After school I watched TV. and had tea.Then I mowed the lawn, and played on the computer.I had a bath then I went to bed at 9:15. {By Robert Glassonbury.
